_sText:
This is 1st playable version of map inspired by real location. I took a part on Realistic mapping contest with uvalno_kostel map, which was big and unplayable. So I decided to remake this map to defusal map.

Technical note.: Please don't be confused... Max/Min Fade distance causing disappearing some far-away props. IT IS NOT BUG, it is optimization method. 

MAP UPDATED ON 20th JULY 2009!!! PLEASE REDOWNLOAD MAP, IF YOU STILL HAVE OLDER VERSION features
- Tree props set to prop_dynamic (better tree shadows casting)
- lightmap grid decreased on floors (8) (more detailed shadows)
- ambient light color changed bit - 3D skybox bugs fixed - T spawn stuck fixed

See also cs_uvalno_night, 2nd playable map based on original map of real location

If you like this one, check all of my maps here
This map or its parts is also used in my singleplayer mod

Have a fun
Dinus Saurus
